attributes.action:
Seek the Crown's ascent to add "Royal" to the abbreviation NHS.
Hence.. RNHS.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament would be the most appropriate body to make this request.
As a tribute to the monumental courage, sacrifice, effort and resilience performed by the organisation and its staff during the recent pandemic.
attributes.background:
Parliament could take a vote and then approach HM Queen.
I'm sure there is a process in place for this sort of thing.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Rename the NHS to "The Royal National Health Service"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568720
